description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Unscramble beautiful  & interesting photographs while listening to peaceful music from Kevin MacLeod. 40+ pictures of various types taken by the creators themselves and family.  No stock photos used! Choose between 5 levels of difficulty.  Try to solve the puzzles in the least moves and time.
